description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(74).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,86,0,0,0,0,1).
mathematica: Denominator/@Convergents[Sqrt[74], 50] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 05 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[-(x^4 - 3 x^3 + 4 x^2 - 2 x + 1) (x^4 + 2 x^3 + 4 x^2 + 3 x + 1)/(x^10 + 86 x^5 - 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 11 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 83, 88, 171, 259, 430]; [n le 10 select I[n] else 86*Self(n-5)+Self(n-10): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 11 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
